Package Clinic.Server

Class ServerSecretary

java.lang.Object
Clinic.Server.ServerSecretary
public class ServerSecretary
extends java.lang.Object
ServerSecretary.java - This class handles the requests from clients, such as finding information, removing information or updating information from the database.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aidan Johnston

    • findToken

      private Token findToken​(Token token)
      Looks through the list clientTokens and tries to find one with the same ID. If one is found it returns true. If none is found false is returned.
      Parameters:
      token -
      Returns:
      boolean

    • handleMessageFromClient

      public void handleMessageFromClient​(Payload payload, ConnectionToClient client)
      Information passed from myServer when message from client is triggered. Messages are first checked to ensure that the user is currently logged in, then it filters it down into its message type and performs the task.
      Parameters:
      payload -
      client -

    • logout

      @Deprecated private void logout​(Payload payload, ConnectionToClient client)
      Deprecated.
      Logs the user out from the server. Returns an update confirmation to the client.
      Parameters:
      payload -
      client -
